Add an Account to list AccountSet.accounts. For credit and loan type accounts, previous statement balance and interest accounts are created.

getAccounts()¶

Get a DataFrame representing the AccountSet object.

This test is failing even though this is indeed the result I get when I try this in the console. # >>> x=AccountSet().getAccounts() # Empty DataFrame # Columns: [Name, Balance, Previous_Statement_Balance, Min_Balance, Max_Balance, APR, Interest_Cadence, Interest_Type, Billing_Start_Dt, Account_Type, Principal_Balance, interest_balance, Minimum_Payment] # Index: []

>>> print(AccountSet([Account.Account(name='test',balance=0,min_balance=0,max_balance=0,account_type="checking")]).toJSON())
{
{
"Name":"test",
"Balance":"0.0",

class BudgetItem.BudgetItem(start_date_YYYYMMDD, end_date_YYYYMMDD, priority, cadence, amount, memo, deferrable=False, partial_payment_allowed=False, print_debug_messages=True, raise_exceptions=True)¶
to_json()¶

Get a <string> representing the <BudgetItem> object.

class BudgetSet.BudgetSet(budget_items__list=None)¶
addBudgetItem(start_date_YYYYMMDD, end_date_YYYYMMDD, priority, cadence, amount, memo, deferrable=False, partial_payment_allowed=False, print_debug_messages=True, raise_exceptions=True)¶

Add a BudgetItem to the list of budget items.

Parameters:

  • start_date_YYYYMMDD (str) – Start date in YYYYMMDD format.

  • end_date_YYYYMMDD (str) – End date in YYYYMMDD format.

  • priority (int) – Priority level of the budget item.

  • cadence (str) – Frequency of the budget item.

  • amount (float) – Amount of the budget item.

  • memo (str) – Memo for the budget item.

  • deferrable (bool) – Indicates if the budget item is deferrable.

  • partial_payment_allowed (bool) – Indicates if partial payments are allowed.

  • print_debug_messages (bool) – If True, prints debug messages.

  • raise_exceptions (bool) – If True, raises exceptions on errors.

Raises:

ValueError – If a budget item with the same priority and memo already exists.

getBudgetItems()¶

Returns a DataFrame of BudgetItems.

DataFrame
